AstralHaze.NAME: Astral Haze
AstralHaze.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. The first time each enemy attacks you this turn, apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to it.

Starburst.NAME: Starburst
Starburst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice to an enemy and then deal !D! damage to ALL other enemies.

Irradiate.NAME: Irradiate
Irradiate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage,  apply !M! Weak, and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

EssenceDart.NAME: Essence Dart
EssenceDart.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have an Ethereal card in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I do not have an Ethereal card in my hand.

NullStorm.NAME: Null Storm
NullStorm.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

VoidRay.NAME: Void Ray
VoidRay.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile. Deal !D! damage.

Comet.NAME: Comet
Comet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals and additional !M! for ALL of your Ethereal cards.

Retrograde.NAME: Retrograde
Retrograde.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. At the end of the turn, shuffle a copy of this card into your draw pile.

MagicMissile.NAME: Magic Missile
MagicMissile.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Exhaust.

Surge.NAME: Surge
Surge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are Weak, Frail, or Vulnerable, deal !D! damage again.

PrismaticSphere.NAME: Prismatic Sphere
PrismaticSphere.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards.

Flux.NAME: Flux
Flux.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

ArcaneArmor.NAME: Arcane Armor
ArcaneArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Every time you draw this card, increase its Block by !M! for this combat.

Flicker.NAME: Flicker
Flicker.DESCRIPTION: Reverse the effects of Frail, Weak, and Vulnerable on you for !M! turn.

Nebula.NAME: Nebula
Nebula.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Block for each Ethereal card in your hand.

DisruptionField.NAME: Disruption Field
DisruptionField.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

Hypothesis.NAME: Hypothesis
Hypothesis.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL If it is Ethereal, add a Dazed to your hand and draw another card.
Hypothesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL If it is Ethereal, add a Dazed to your hand and draw !M! more cards.

Singularity.NAME: Singularity
Singularity.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Gain !B! Block. Deal !D! damage. Next turn gain [R].
Singularity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Gain !B! Block. Deal !D! damage. Next turn gain [R].

Genesis.NAME: Genesis
Genesis.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards.

DarkMatter.NAME: Dark Matter
DarkMatter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each Exhausted Ethereal card this combat.

Entropy.NAME: Entropy
Entropy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Increase this cards values by 1 until the end of combat.

PhaseCoil.NAME: Phase Coil
PhaseCoil.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [R] for each Ethereal card in hand. NL Deal !D! damage.

PlasmaWave.NAME: Plasma Wave
PlasmaWave.DESCRIPTION: Spend all [R]. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. Vulnerable enemies are dealt double damage.

EtherBlast.NAME: Ether Blast
EtherBlast.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Deal !M! damage for each Ethereal card in your hand.

ForceRipple.NAME: Force Ripple
ForceRipple.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain X Weak, X Frail, and X Vulnerable.

SiphonPower.NAME: Siphon Power
SiphonPower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain 1 Strength.

Syzygy.NAME: Syzygy
Syzygy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile. Exhaust

ThoughtRaze.NAME: Thought Raze
ThoughtRaze.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Ethereal cards in your draw pile. Deal !D! damage for each card that is Exhausted.

UmbralBolt.NAME: Umbral Bolt
UmbralBolt.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Frail, Weak, and Vulnerable. NL Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile for each stack removed.

GravityWell.NAME: Gravity Well
GravityWell.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is Weak, it loses !M! Strength. Exhaust.

Nexus.NAME: Nexus
Nexus.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a non-Ethereal Attack or Skill, shuffle an Ethereal copy of it into your draw pile.

PeriaptOfCelerity.NAME: Periapt of Celerity
PeriaptOfCelerity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Ethereal card is Exhausted, gain !M! Dexterity.

PeriaptOfPotency.NAME: Periapt of Potency
PeriaptOfPotency.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Ethereal card is Exhausted, gain !M! Strength.

PowerOverwhelming.NAME: Power Overwhelming
PowerOverwhelming.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Whenever you play an attack, shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

Anomaly.NAME: Anomaly
Anomaly.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Vulnerable or Weak to an enemy, apply !M! additional stack.
Anomaly.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Vulnerable or Weak to an enemy, apply !M! additional stacks.

Vortex.NAME: Vortex
Vortex.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Exhaust your hand. Shuffle 1 Dazed into your draw pile for each card that was Exahusted.

Archives.NAME: Archives
Archives.DESCRIPTION: Gain [R] for every !M! cards in your draw pile.

Brainstorm.NAME: Brainstorm
Brainstorm.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile and a Dazed into your draw pile. NL Next turn, draw !M! card.
Brainstorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile and a Dazed into your draw pile. NL Next turn, draw !M! cards.

Brilliance.NAME: Brilliance
Brilliance.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 3 Dazed into your draw pile. NL Whenever you draw a Dazed, draw !M! card.
Brilliance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 3 Dazed into your draw pile. Whenever you draw a Dazed, draw !M! cards.

Corona.NAME: Corona
Corona.DESCRIPTION: A random Ethereal card in your hand costs 0 this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: There are no Ethereal cards in my hand.

Equinox.NAME: Equinox
Equinox.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your discard pile is empty or your draw pile is empty. NL Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: My discard pile or my draw pile must be empty.

Experiment.NAME: Experiment
Experiment.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to Debuff you, gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

Flow.NAME: Flow
Flow.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Retain all excess Energy at the end of turn. Draw 1 extra card next turn.

Illuminate.NAME: Illuminate
Illuminate.DESCRIPTION: Create !M! copy of an Ethereal card in your hand. Recycle that copy.
Illuminate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create !M! copies of an Ethereal card in your hand. Recycle those copies.

MindOverMatter.NAME: Mind Over Matter
MindOverMatter.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Frail, Weak, and Vulnerable. NL Gain !M! Block for each stack removed.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I am not Frail, Weak or Vulnerable.

Overload.NAME: Overload
Overload.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Vulnerable. NL Gain !M! Energy. NL Gives 1 less Energy each time this card is used this combat.

Shimmer.NAME: Shimmer
Shimmer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL All cards in hand become Ethereal. NL Exhaust.

Convergence.NAME: Convergence
Convergence.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When you draw this card upgrade a random card in your hand.
Convergence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, upgrade a card in your hand.

SiphonSpeed.NAME: Siphon Speed
SiphonSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain 1 Dexterity.

StrokeOfGenius.NAME: Stroke of Genius
StrokeOfGenius.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Power to your hand. NL Exhaust.
StrokeOfGenius.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Power to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Transference.NAME: Transference
Transference.DESCRIPTION: Transfer all of your Weak and Vulnerable to an enemy.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I am not Weak or Vulnerable.

Channel.NAME: Channel
Channel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card. NL If it is Ethereal, deal !D! more damage.

Feedback.NAME: Feedback
Feedback.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Weak and Vulnerable from an Enemy. It loses !M! HP per stack removed.

Implosion.NAME: Implosion
Implosion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Shuffle !M! Dazed into your draw pile.

MeteorShower.NAME: Meteor Shower
MeteorShower.DESCRIPTION: Deal 1 damage to ALL enemies for each card in your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
MeteorShower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Deal 1 damage to ALL enemies for each card in your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Vacuum.NAME: Vacuum
Vacuum.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of your Weak, Frail, and Vulnerable. NL Deal !M! damage for each stack removed.

ChaosForm.NAME: Chaos Form
ChaosForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle a random Ethereal card into your draw pile.
ChaosForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle a random Ethereal card into your draw pile. NL It costs 0 until played.

Creativity.NAME: Creativity
Creativity.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile, then draw a card.

Enigma.NAME: Enigma
Enigma.DESCRIPTION: Dazed can now be played to gain !M! Block and deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

EventHorizon.NAME: Event Horizon
EventHorizon.DESCRIPTION: Each enemy loses HP equal to the amount of Weak and Vulnerable it has at the start of its turn.

RunicBinding.NAME: Runic Binding
RunicBinding.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an Ethereal card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

AstralShift.NAME: Dimension Door
AstralShift.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust.

Echo.NAME: Echo
Echo.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Ethereal card is played twice.
Echo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 2 Ethereal cards are played twice.

Eclipse.NAME: Eclipse
Eclipse.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Exhausted Ethereal card. NL Put it on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have any Exhausted Ethereal cards.

Eureka.NAME: Eureka!
Eureka.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [R] [R]. NL Exhaust.
Eureka.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [R] [R] [R]. NL Exhaust.

ReflectionWard.NAME: Reflection Ward
ReflectionWard.DESCRIPTION: Gain 4 Block and 2 Reflect per !M! cards in your draw pile.

Zenith.NAME: Zenith
Zenith.DESCRIPTION: After paying this card's cost, double your remaining [R]. NL Exhaust.
Zenith.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: After paying this card's cost, double your remaining [R].

Coalescence.NAME: Coalescence
Coalescence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Frail, Weak, or Vulnerable, gain !M! Block.

Nova.NAME: Nova
Nova.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle 2 Dazed into your Draw pile.
